name: Space J
description:
A simple Spaceshooter study made in 2022

WASD - to move the ship

Space/J - to shot

E - to shield

Power Ups drop from enemies and updrage your ship.

Art by Mirage42cit

Animation by Mirage42cit

Programming by Mirage42cit

Music - Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) / SFX - Mirage42cit
